scripts.security:full-scan: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); let auditExit = 0; try { execSync('npm audit', { stdio: 'inherit' }); } catch (e) { auditExit = e.status || 1; } try { execSync('npm outdated', { stdio: 'inherit' }); } catch (e) { /* ignore outdated exit code */ } console.log('Security scan complete'); process.exit(auditExit);"
